data.text: Monga ntchentche zakufa zimayika fungo loyipa mʼmafuta onunkhira,
Mtima wa munthu wanzeru umamutsogolera bwino,
Chitsiru ngakhale chikamayenda mu msewu,
Ngati wolamulira akukwiyira,
Pali choyipa chimene ndinachiona pansi pano,
Zitsiru amazipatsa ntchito zambiri zapamwamba,
Ndaona akapolo atakwera pa akavalo,
Amene amakumba dzenje adzagwamo yekha;
Amene amaphwanya miyala adzapwetekedwa ndi miyalayo;
Ngati nkhwangwa ili yobuntha
Nʼkopanda phindu kudziwa kuseweretsa njoka
Mawu a pakamwa pa munthu wanzeru ndi okondweretsa,
Chitsiru chimayamba ndi mawu opusa;
ndipo chitsiru chimachulukitsa mawu.
Chitsiru chimatopa msanga ndi ntchito yochepa;
Tsoka kwa iwe, iwe dziko ngati mfumu yako ikali mwana,
Wodala iwe, iwe dziko ngati mfumu yako ndi mwana wolemekezeka
Ngati munthu ndi waulesi, denga lake limaloshoka;
Phwando ndi lokondweretsa anthu,
Usanyoze mfumu ngakhale mu mtima mwako,
